statements: SELECT * FROM customer_transaction_logs WHERE customer_id = 100
SELECT transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM customer_transaction_logs ORDER BY transaction_date DESC
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM customer_transaction_logs WHERE transaction_type = 'Purchase'
SELECT AVG(transaction_amount) AS average_amount FROM customer_transaction_logs GROUP BY transaction_type
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM customer_transaction_logs
SELECT customer_id, transaction_amount FROM customer_transaction_logs WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT * FROM customer_transaction_logs WHERE customer_id = 100 AND transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC
SELECT customer_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM customer_transaction_logs GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT customer_id, transaction_amount FROM customer_transaction_logs WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30' ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC
SELECT customer_id, AVG(transaction_amount) AS average_amount FROM customer_transaction_logs GROUP BY customer_id HAVING average_amount > 500
SELECT * FROM customer_transactions WHERE transaction_id = 1001;
SELECT customer_id, transaction_amount FROM customer_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date FROM customer_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM suspicious_activities WHERE activity_type = 'Fraud';
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM customer_transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_amount > 5000;
SELECT * FROM customer_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC, transaction_amount DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT transaction_id, customer_id, transaction_amount FROM customer_transactions WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY transaction_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM suspicious_activities WHERE activity_type = 'Fraud' ORDER BY activity_timestamp ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM customer_transactions WHERE transaction_date BETWEEN '2021-05-01' AND '2021-05-31';
SELECT customer_id, SUM(transaction_amount) AS total_amount FROM customer_transactions GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_amount > 5000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM customer_transactions;
SELECT customer_id, transaction_amount FROM customer_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount, transaction_date FROM customer_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase';
SELECT * FROM customer_profiles ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, suspicious_reason, detection_date FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE detection_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM customer_transactions WHERE customer_id = 101 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, transaction_amount FROM customer_profiles JOIN customer_transactions ON customer_profiles.customer_id = customer_transactions.customer_id;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_amount FROM customer_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 AND transaction_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';

SELECT customer_name, customer_email, transaction_type FROM customer_profiles LEFT JOIN customer_transactions ON customer_profiles.customer_id = customer_transactions.customer_id WHERE transaction_amount IS NULL;

SELECT transaction_id, suspicious_reason, detection_date FROM suspicious_transactions LEFT JOIN customer_transactions ON suspicious_transactions.transaction_id = customer_transactions.transaction_id WHERE transaction_amount < 0;
SELECT * FROM customer_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customer_details WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT transaction_amount FROM customer_transactions WHERE transaction_type = 'purchase' AND transaction_amount > 1000;
SELECT log_timestamp, log_message FROM transaction_logs ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM suspicious_activity WHERE activity_type = 'fraud';
SELECT * FROM customer_transactions WHERE transaction_amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_name, customer_email, customer_phone FROM customer_details WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

SELECT log_timestamp, log_message FROM transaction_logs JOIN customer_transactions ON transaction_logs.transaction_id = customer_transactions.transaction_id WHERE customer_transactions.transaction_amount < 500 ORDER BY log_timestamp ASC;

SELECT customer_name, customer_email, transaction_amount FROM customer_details JOIN customer_transactions ON customer_details.customer_id = customer_transactions.customer_id WHERE transaction_type = 'refund';
SELECT activity_id, activity_type, activity_description FROM suspicious_activity WHERE activity_type = 'fraud' ORDER BY activity_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers;
SELECT customer_name, account_balance FROM customers WHERE account_balance > 1000;
SELECT customer_name, transaction_date FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, transaction_type FROM transactions WHERE amount > 500 ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT customer_id, alert_type FROM fraud_alerts WHERE alert_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE account_balance > 5000;
SELECT customer_name, account_balance FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 5;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date FROM transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(transaction_id) as total_transactions FROM transactions GROUP BY customer_id;
SELECT * FROM suspicious_transactions WHERE amount >= 1000 ORDER BY amount DESC, transaction_date ASC;
